Quarter: The specific quarter for which the hiring data is being reported, e.g., Q1 2024.
New_Hires: The number of new employees hired during the specified quarter.
Total_Employee_Count: The total number of employees in the company at the end of the specified quarter.
Hiring_Growth_Rate: The percentage increase in the number of employees compared to the previous quarter.
Notes: Additional comments or notes related to the hiring statistics for the specified quarter.
New hiring data does not relate to insurance acceptance factors.
Minimal hiring due to budget constraints.
